about_the_game:
This Fantasy themed package can be used to create various Female Fae characters dressed in leaves with fairy wings.
The output resolution of this pack is 1010 x 1200 pixels.

Content usable by all Season #2 Female characters:
- 11 skins
- 5 colourable hairs
- 4 hair presets
- 4 hats
- 4 hats with hair
- 2 full set of clothes
- 18 boots
- 13 pants
- 24 tops
- 1 top armor
- 11 under armors
- 14 bracelets
- 5 chest items
- 1 coat
- 13 necklaces
- 9 loin clothes
- 1 thigh item
- 3 tights
- 11 waist items
- 23 weapons
- 12 wings

Additional content available to all Season #2 Fantasy themed packs in the General category:
- 3 backgrounds
- 7 companions
- 6 items

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium®4 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel i3 @ 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2560 x 1440 pixels or higher desktop resolution
